casebody.data:
No. 09-10337. Tomas Mares-Calderon, Petitioner v. United States; and Mauro Varilla-Quevado, Petitioner v. United States. 562 U.S. 801, 131 S. Ct. 80,

178 L. Ed. 2d 2,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 6585. October 4, 2010.

On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit. Motion of petitioners for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit for further consideration in light of Carachuri-Rosendo v. Holder, 560 U.S. 563, 130 S. Ct. 2577, 177 L. Ed. 2d 68 (2010).

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion and this petition.

Same case below, 370 Fed. Appx. 518 (first judgment); 365 Fed. Appx. 583 (second judgment).
